text: "Middle of the Night" is a song by British band The Vamps and Danish DJ and producer Martin Jensen. The dubstep-infused song was released as a digital download on 28 April 2017 by Virgin EMI Records and served as the second single from their number one third studio album Night & Day, being included on the first part of it, called Night Edition. ==Music video== A music video was released on 15 May 2017. The video portrays a deaf couple arguing in sign language during dinner.
